titles.title: For the relief of Shiuyun Holst Zhou.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 7/23/2003--Introduced. Declares Shiuyun Holst Zhou eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident under the Immigration and Nationality Act, upon payment of the required visa fees.
